sf18:7: \\\++ādhyātmikam āyatanaṁ tac ca bhagavatā uddiṣṭam avibhaktaṁ \\\
sf18:13: \\\++ sapratighaṁ ucyate bhadaṁta dharmā bāhyam āyatanam ++\\\
sf18:14: \\\sarvaṁ ca sarvam astīti sarvadharmāmś ca pṛcchati brahmaṇo bhikṣu \\\
sf18:15: \\\+ | ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni katamāni ṣaṭ rūpaṁ bāhyam. ++\\\
sf18:18: \\\ dharmāṁś ca pṛcchati brāhmaṇo bhikṣur ānandaḥ śāstā bhikṣu u +++
sf18:19: \\\? ṭ cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanaṁ śrotraṁ ghrānaṁ jihvā kāyo +\\\
sf18:20: \\\? bdo rasaḥ spraṣṭavyo dharmo bāhyam āyatanam || ṣaḍ vijñāṇa \\\
sf18:22: \\\ saṁsparśajā vedanā || ṣaḍ ime saṁjñākāyāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣu +\\\
sf18:25: \\\? ṣṭavyāvekṣaḥ dharmāvekṣa || ṣaḍ imāni cetakhilaṁ mṛkṣa + \\\
sf18:26: \\\? dharmāḥ sāsravāḥ sopādānīyāḥ cetaḥkhilaṁ mrakṣa vastu\\\
sf18:27: \\\? stunā || cakṣur bhikṣavaḥ anityam atītam anāgataṁ kaḥ \\\
sf18:28: \\\ nandati pratyupannasya cakṣuṣo nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya\\\
